queries.add: CREATE TABLE[dbo].[Customer]( [Client_Id][int] PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL, [FirstName] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [LastName] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [Phone] [varchar](9) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE[dbo].[Employees]( [Employee_Id][int] PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL, [FirstName] [varchar](50) NOT NULL, [LastName] [varchar](50) NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Booking] ( [Booking_Id] INT IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Date] DATE NOT NULL, [Hour_Id] INT NOT NULL, [Customer_Id] INT NOT NULL, [Emplyees_Id] INT NOT NULL, [Job_Id] INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [FK_Booking_Job] FOREIGN KEY ([Job_Id]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Job] ([Job_Id]), CONSTRAINT [FK_Booking_Customer] FOREIGN KEY ([Customer_Id]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Customer] ([Client_Id]), CONSTRAINT [FK_Booking_Employees] FOREIGN KEY ([Emplyees_Id]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Employees] ([Employee_Id]), CONSTRAINT [FK_Booking_Hour] FOREIGN KEY ([Hour_Id]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Hour] ([Hour_Id]) );
